methods.name: showModalMessageDialog
methods.comment:
Static helper method to easily display a modal message dialog showing a text string
 with an "OK" button.
 
 If the text is too long to fit, a scroll bar will be used.
 
 The text string can be plain text (with \n line breaks) or HTML (if the first
 6 characters of the string are html).
 
 This method will not return until the user presses the OK button.

params.name: shortMessage
params.comment: - short message that appears above the main message.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: shortMessage
params.comment: a short message to display at the top of the dialog

params.name: messageType
params.comment: the message type (warning, error, info, etc)

params.name: modal
params.comment: true if the dialog should be modal
